lead_paragraph: The truck, whose architecture has remained mostly the same since its inception in 1979, is a combination of luxury, utility, capability and status.

headline.print_headline: The Mercedes G550: Primal Appeal Endures
headline.main: Video Review: The Mercedes G550’s Primal Appeal Endures

snippet: The truck, whose architecture has remained mostly the same since its inception in 1979, is a combination of luxury, utility, capability and status.
abstract: Driven column review of Mercedes G550.
